parties.title: Jam'iyyun siyasa
parties.subtitle: Haɗa duniya baki ɗaya a kan dabi'u masu raba

referendums.title: Zaɓen Raba Gardama na Tsarin Mulki na Duniya
referendums.subtitle: Yi zaɓe a kan ƙa'idodin mu na asali

parties.found_party_and_earn: Kafa jam'iyya kuma ku sami tallafi

dialogs.about_to_dissolve: Kana shirin rusa {partyName}. Wannan aikin ba za a iya juyar da shi ba.
dialogs.leader_warning_found: Kai ne shugaban {partyName} a yanzu. Kafa sabuwar jam'iyya zai rusa jam'iyyarka ta yanzu.

detail.not_found_description: Jam'iyyar da kake nema ba ta wanzu ba ko kuma an rusa ta.

pre_verification.description: Zaɓe na gwaji suna zuwa nan ba da jimawa ba. Tabbatar da ainihin ku yanzu don kasancewa shirye lokacin da zaɓe ya buɗe.

coming_soon.description: Zaɓen gwaji zai fara ba da daɗewa ba. An riga an tabbatar da kai, kuma kana shirye ka ƙaɗa kuri’a da zaran zaɓen ya fara.

app-purpose.question: Menene Jamhuriyar Duniya?
app-purpose.answer: Jamhuriyar Duniya dandali ne na mulki mai buɗe tushe tare da kuɗin dijital na kansa wanda ke nufin kafa tsarin dimokuradiyya don zaman lafiya da tsaro na duniya.

what-is-wdd.question: Menene WDD?
what-is-wdd.answer: WDD (drachma duniya) kudin hukuma ne na blockchain-native na Jamhuriyar Duniya, wanda aka fitar da shi azaman token ERC-20 na yau da kullun a cikin hanyoyin sadarwa da yawa.

drachma-value.question: Ina drachma ke samun ƙimarsa?
drachma-value.answer: Drachma yana samun darajarsa daga kasancewa kudin hukuma na Jamhuriyar Duniya. Yayin da halaccin dandalin mulkin duniya yake girma, WDD na iya zama abin rarraba duniya da kuma babban hanyar musayar tattalin arzikin duniya.

identity-verification.question: Yaya tabbatar da asali ke aiki?
identity-verification.answer: Jamhuriyar Duniya tana amfani da Self don tabbatar da asalin ku ta hanyar fasfo ko katin shaidar ƙasa. Sirrinku yana kariya—Self kawai yana tabbatar da cewa kai mutum ne na gaske ba tare da bayyana bayanan ku na sirri ba.

test-elections.question: Menene zaɓen gwaji?
test-elections.answer: Zaɓen gwaji gwaje-gwaje ne inda 'yan ƙasa na Jamhuriyar Duniya ke jefa ƙuri'a ga jam'iyyun siyasa. Ana saka kowace jam'iyya ta atomatik a kan takardar jefa ƙuri'a, tare da tabbatar da dama daidai ga duk masu son zama shugabanni.

party-subsidies.question: Yaya tallafin jam'iyya ke aiki?
party-subsidies.answer: Jamhuriyar Duniya tana tallafawa jam'iyyun siyasa dangane da goyon bayan dimokuradiyya. Muna rarraba tallafin WDD daidai da sakamakon zaɓe, tare da tabbatar da cewa kowace ƙuri'a tana haɓaka albarkatun kuɗi na jam'iyya kai tsaye.

verification-required.question: Ana buƙatar tabbatarwa don shiga?
verification-required.answer: Ana buƙatar tabbatar da ainihi kawai don yin zaɓe. Kuna iya kafa jam'iyyu kuma ku canza WDD da aka samu daga tallafin jam'iyyu ba tare da tabbatarwa ba.

sign_out.confirm: Kuna da tabbacin cewa kuna son fita?

send.title: Aika WDD
send.choice_description: Zaɓi yadda kake son aika drachma naka.

transfer_to_citizen.title: Canja
transfer_to_citizen.description: Canja WDD zuwa wani ɗan ƙasa

delete_account.description: Wannan zai share asusu ɗinku na dindindin kuma ya cire duk bayananku daga sabobin mu. Wannan aikin ba za a iya juyar da shi ba — don Allah ku ci gaba da hankali.

receive.title: Karɓa WDD
receive.description: Raba sunan mai amfani don karɓar WDD daga abokanka.

delete_account.description: Cire duk bayanan ku na dindindin

self.dialog_description: Duba wannan lambar QR don tabbatarwa ta Self.
self.mobile_dialog_description: Za a mayar da kai zuwa manhajar Self don kammala tantancewa.

verification_explainer.title: Tabbatarwa yana buƙata
verification_explainer.description: Don Allah kammala tabbatarwa don cire tokens.

re_verification_explainer.title: Sake tabbatarwa yana buƙata
re_verification_explainer.description: Don amincin ku, muna buƙatar sabuwar tabbatarwa kafin ayyuka masu mahimmanci kamar cirewa. Wannan yana taimakawa kare asusunku daga shiga mara izini.

wdd_import_info.message_prefix: Yawancin walat ɗin suna nuna WDD ne kawai bayan an shigo da shi da hannu a kan zaɓaɓɓen sarkar ta

wallet.contract_address_error: Ba za a iya cire zuwa adireshin kwangilar ba

common.invalid_address: Adireshin da ba a yarda da shi ba

auth.choose_method: Zaɓi hanyar da kuka fi so.
auth.sign_in_or_create: Shiga asusunka tare da passkey, ta amfani da yatsa, binciken fuska ko kulle allon.
auth.passkey_name_description: Suna passkey ɗinka don gane shi a cikin mai sarrafa kalmar sirri.
